page.title: 02LOCAL HISTORY IN HOLTON
page.content:
In Holton-le-Clay there is a Local History club.It contains twelve keen members.The club is held every Tuesday evening.The twelve members sometimes read about history.Other times they talk and go on trips to find out about {Local History.}The group studies leaflets and books. This table shows the growth of population and other changes between 1905 and 1985.
{Date} {1905 1925 1945 1965 1985 {Population }300 400 450 3500 4000 {Houses }60 90 100 800 1200 {Shops }2 3 4 8 11 {(Number) }8 8 8 6 5 {Per (Horses) }8 6 4 0 0 {Farm(Men)} 8 6 4 2 2 {(Tractors) }0 1 3 8 15
